main event: A round, bright reddish-pink and green object was observed hovering in the sky and moving slowly with a pulsating motion on November 27, 1952.
interesting points: The object was reported as being larger than one, with an estimated size of 50 to 100 feet in diameter., It changed direction sharply and moved at a high rate of speed after hovering., The object was stationary initially and moved alternately up and down., The sighting involved at least three witnesses., The visibility and clearness of the event were noted as below average.
sighted object: round, bright reddish-pink and green object
witness description: At least three people observed the object during the sighting.
